name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Boar
effectText: Cannot be used as a Synchro Material Monster, except for the Synchro Summon of a FIRE monster. When this card is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 "Fire Fist" monster from your Deck, except "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Boar". Once per turn, when a "Fire Fist" monster is Special Summoned from your Extra Deck: You can Set 1 "Fire Formation" Spell Card directly from your Deck.
